document.full_text: prime minister naoto kan said on wednesday that japan needs to fundamentally rethink how nuclear power is regulated but sidestepped the question of how big a role atomic energy would play in the country's future.
document.title: japan pm: must review oversight of nuclear power
lines_and_colors: prime minister naoto kan said on wednesday that japan needs to fundamentally rethink how nuclear power is regulated but sidestepped the question of how big a role atomic energy would play in the country's future.
